user_instruction: 'Assist me in responding to Mr. Thompson'"'"'s email (editor@vitalvoices.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi Jane,

To help craft an effective reply to Mr. Thompson, could you please share:

• The full text (or key excerpts) of the email you received from editor@vitalvoices.com.  
• Any background notes or talking points you’ve saved in Notion that you’d like incorporated.  
• Your main goals or concerns for this response (e.g., topics you’re eager to highlight, availability, tone preferences).

You can simply forward the email from your Gmail and/or drop links or summaries from Notion—whatever’s easiest. Once I have those details, I’ll draft a tailored reply for you promptly.

Thank you!

Best,  
[Your Assistant’s Name]
